name: Quick WP-CLI command reference
prompt: I need to backup my Seravo site before making changes. What's the command and what does it actually do?
expectations: Explains it backs up both database AND /data directory
Notes it runs automatically every night

name: Git deployment workflow
prompt: I've made changes to my theme locally. Walk me through deploying them to production on Seravo using Git.
expectations: Shows git add and git commit steps
Explains git hooks may run tests

name: Local Docker setup
prompt: I'm setting up a new Seravo project locally with Docker. What are the essential steps to get it running?
expectations: Notes visiting https://wordpress.local or configured domain

name: Database sync from production
prompt: How do I pull the production database to my local development environment? I want to make sure URLs are updated correctly.
expectations: Mentions URLs from config.yml are used
Notes this is safe and doesn't affect production

name: Directory structure understanding
prompt: Where should I put my custom theme on a Seravo server? I'm confused about the directory structure.
expectations: Explains WordPress core is in separate directory
Explains this separation helps with version control
Notes not to modify core files

name: Cache clearing troubleshooting
prompt: I updated my site but changes aren't showing. How do I clear all caches on Seravo?
expectations: Lists what caches are cleared: Nginx proxy, object cache, rewrite cache, PageSpeed
Mentions this clears ALL server caches
Suggests when to use it: after DB imports, config changes, debugging

name: SSH connection setup
prompt: I keep getting 'Permission denied' when trying to SSH to my Seravo site. How do I set up SSH keys properly?
expectations: Shows ssh-keygen command for generating keys
Explains ssh-copy-id to copy public key to server
Notes Windows users need manual key copy

name: config.yml configuration
prompt: What should I put in my config.yml file? I need to set up local development with a custom domain.
expectations: Includes name, production (domain, ssh_port), and development sections

name: Environment variables access
prompt: How do I see my database credentials on Seravo? I need to connect with a GUI tool.
expectations: Mentions environment variables for DB credentials
Shows filtering with grep (e.g., wp-list-env | grep DB_)
May mention SSH tunnel for external tools

name: Multisite URL replacement
prompt: I have a WordPress multisite and I'm pulling the production database locally. Will the subdomains get updated automatically?
expectations: Mentions subdomains must be in config.yml development.domains

name: Custom WP-CLI command discovery
prompt: What custom commands does Seravo provide? I want to see what tools are available beyond standard wp-cli.
expectations: Lists key custom commands with wp- prefix
Mentions categories: backup, database sync, development, cache, security
Highlights commonly used ones: wp-backup, wp-pull-production-db, wp-purge-cache
Mentions man <command> or command --help for details

name: Database export and import
prompt: I need to export the database, make some manual edits, and import it back. What's the workflow?
expectations: May mention wp db reset to clear existing data first

name: Performance debugging
prompt: My site feels slow. What Seravo-specific tools can I use to measure and debug performance?
expectations: Mentions wp-speed-test for page load times
Suggests wp-purge-cache to eliminate cache issues
May mention database optimization with wp db optimize

name: Must-use plugin management
prompt: How do I remove a must-use plugin on Seravo? The regular wp plugin delete doesn't work.
expectations: Explains must-use plugins are in wp-content/mu-plugins/
Notes they auto-activate and can't be disabled normally
Shows using rm command to delete from filesystem

name: Shadow environment usage
prompt: What's the difference between shadow and production environments on Seravo? How do I use shadow for testing?
expectations: Mentions different SSH port for shadow
Recommends testing updates/changes on shadow first
Notes shadow has separate environment but same codebase

name: Migration workflow
prompt: I'm migrating a WordPress site TO Seravo from another host. What's the recommended SSH/WP-CLI method?
expectations: Suggests SSH + WP-CLI as most reliable
Shows wp db export on old server
Shows rsync for database and wp-content
Shows wp search-replace for URL updates

name: Git hooks and testing
prompt: How can I set up automated tests that run when I commit code on Seravo?
expectations: Explains hooks run on git commit
Notes tests prevent broken code from being pushed

name: Asset proxy understanding
prompt: What's the asset proxy in Seravo's local development? My images aren't loading locally.
expectations: Explains asset proxy fetches missing media from production
Mentions requires internet connection and production domain in config.yml
Notes it's automatic for uploads/ directory
Helps save disk space during development

name: Security audit workflow
prompt: I think someone unauthorized accessed my site. What Seravo commands help me audit access and changes?
expectations: Shows wp-last-ssh-logins for SSH access history

name: Nginx configuration
prompt: Can I customize Nginx configuration on Seravo? I need to add custom headers.
expectations: Notes Nginx reloads automatically if valid

name: Composer dependency management
prompt: How do I use Composer to manage plugins on Seravo?
expectations: Shows composer require for installing packages
May mention composer install --no-dev for production

name: Environment-specific code
prompt: I want to enable WP_DEBUG only in development, not production. How do I do this on Seravo?
expectations: Explains WP_ENV values: production, staging, development
Shows setting WP_DEBUG based on environment
May show in wp-config.php or functions.php

name: SSH tunnel for database GUI
prompt: I want to connect to my Seravo database with TablePlus. How do I set up the connection?
expectations: Notes no direct external MySQL access for security

name: Complete deployment workflow
prompt: Walk me through a complete workflow: I'm developing a new feature locally, testing it, and deploying to production on Seravo.
expectations: Shows git commit locally with testing

name: Troubleshooting database import
prompt: My database import is failing with ENGINE errors. What's wrong and how do I fix it?
expectations: Shows sed command to remove ENGINE definitions
Explains why this happens (from different servers)
